thread.title: Fujifilm Shouldn’t Replicate Xerox Deal, Investors Say

author: Mayumi Negishi
title: Fujifilm Shouldn’t Replicate Xerox Deal, Investors Say
text:
TOKYO—Beaten back in its bid for control of Xerox Corp., Fujifilm Holdings Corp. now must decide whether it wants to keep trying to double down on copiers—plus potentially pay more to do so.
Xerox on Tuesday said it might scrap its agreement to be taken over by Fujifilm, as it handed board control to Xerox shareholders who have criticized the Japanese company’s dealings.
Meanwhile,...
